question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding mangroves?
1. Mangroves require low solar radiation.
2. They have the ability to absorb fresh water from saline/brackish water.
3. Mangroves produces pneumatophores (blind roots) to overcome respiration problem in the anaerobic soil conditions.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Mangroves require high solar radiation. They have the ability to absorb fresh water from saline/brackish water. Mangroves produces pneumatophores (blind roots) to overcome respiration problem in the anaerobic soil conditions.
